title: Jon Whittle
text:
Jon Whittle (born 9 September 1982) is a former professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> and <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 2000s. He played club level <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> (RU), for <a href="Orrell%20R.U.F.C.">Orrell R.U.F.C.</a>, and club level <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> (RL), for <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan Warriors</a>, <a href="Widnes%20Vikings">Widnes Vikings</a>, <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity Wildcats</a> (<a href="list%20of%20Wakefield%20Trinity%20players">Heritage № 1232</a>), and <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> (<a href="list%20of%20Featherstone%20Rovers%20players">Heritage № 895</a>), as a , or .
Playing career.
Club career.
Jon Whittle made his début for <a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> on Sunday 11 February 2007.
